title: Bono: In Conversation with Michka Assayas
description: A portrait of the Grammy Award-winning lead singer of U2 discusses how his life and achievements defy rock-star clich√©s, describing his transformation from a post-punk band singer to one of the industry's most famous figures, his long-time marriage to his childhood sweetheart, and his work as a spokesperson for Third-World issues.
author: Michka Assayas
